entry.string: All privileges in the system can be changed or removed. (For those protected by GeneralLock above this takes a bit more doing.) You can also combine privileges by using them as elements to create compound privileges, or make new privileges of your choosing. There is no limit to the number of privileges you can create or their levels of nesting.
Extended information about this module can be found in
entry.translation: Weitere Informationen zu diesem Modul können gefunden werden in

entry.string: Module to which this provilege will apply
entry.translation: Modul, für das dieses Privileg gilt

entry.string: Xaraya's privileges are extremely flexible. You can define privileges at the level of site, modules, component classes within modules, or single instances of those classes.
entry.translation: Xaraya's Privilegien sind extrem flexibel. Berechtigungen können auf der Stufe von Websites, Modulen, Komponentenklassen innerhalb von Modulen oder einzelnen Instanzen eben dieser Klassen definieren werden.

entry.string: Clicking on the View Privileges link gives you an overview of all the privileges on your system. Compound privileges are collapsed, but you can click on them to open them up and view their components.
Administration: a privilege that gives a role complete access to all resources on the site. At installation this privilege is assigned to the role Administrators and is inherited by the user Admin.
CasualAccess: this is the privilege assigned to unregistered users on the site. It is initially defined to allow viewing access of the front page, as well as access to the login block.
GeneralLock: a privilege that restricts access to certain basic roles and privileges the system requires, such as the default admin. This is to avoid inadvertent removal.

All privileges in the system can be changed or removed. (For those protected by GeneralLock above this takes a bit more doing.) You can also combine privileges by using them as elements to create compound privileges, or make new privileges of your choosing. There is no limit to the number of privileges you can create or their levels of nesting.

Remember that you can assign privileges to the Myself role, and those privileges will only apply to a specific user and the content owned or authored by that specific eg they could edit their own articles, or comments but not articles or comments created by others.
(applies only to the Text Value option above)
Allow instances of component #(1) that have:
entry.translation: Instanzen von Komponenten #(1) zulassen, die haben:

Warning: This setting opens a tab to enable you to create an administrator whose privileges cannot be removed.
Checking this enables the Manage Realms item on the Privileges menu
(only applies when Text Value option is chosen)
The Last Resort Administrator will always have rights to the entire system.
Enter a name and password to replace the existing Last Resort administrator.

This option is provided for Web Developer convenience. In general most Site Administrators should not need to access the Masks list provided below. Editing of the masks without an understanding of how they function can result in access problems to content on your site.
These settings let a designated tester see security check messages on a live site.
Name of the administator that will see the messages
They will see the security check messages.
Adding a mask name here will show only the checks involving that mask
